WARNING!These setting will change the device connection behavior.If you have modified Group Mappings, you may need to change your cable to a different port socket based on your new setting.If the device fail to reconnect back to this Admin page, it is most likely that you have used a wrong port socket.Also, please ensure that your new IP MUST BE under the same subnet as the connected port.You may need to reboot your PC or restart network card to obtain a correct IP.
